name: Brood
description: Immerse into a mythical meadow full of unrevealed secrets as you play as a fox attempting to find something dear to him.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3320M Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 344 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
